korean: 오늘도 야근이다. 이번 주 내내 밤 10시가 넘어서 퇴근했다.
프로젝트 마감이 다음 주라서 할 일이 산더미야.
회사에서 야근 수당이랑 저녁 식대 나와서 그나마 다행이야.
동료들이랑 같이 남아서 그나마 덜 힘들었다.
혼자 남아 있었으면 진짜 우울했을 것 같아.
중간에 커피 마시면서 잠깐 쉬었는데 금방 또 졸려.
시계 보니까 벌써 11시더라. 시간 진짜 빠르네.
어디 여행이라도 가서 푹 쉬고 싶어.
집에 가는 막차 시간 확인하면서 일 마무리했어.
내일도 야근인데 진짜 빨리 끝나면 좋겠다.
english: Working late again today. I've been leaving past 10 PM all week.
The project deadline is next week, so there's a mountain of work to do.
I was hungry, so I ordered chicken and worked while eating.
At least the company gives overtime pay and a dinner allowance, so that's something.
At least I wasn't alone—staying with my coworkers made it more bearable.
If I'd been here by myself, I think I would've been seriously depressed.
I took a quick coffee break in between, but I got sleepy again pretty fast.
I looked at the clock and it was already 11 PM. Time really flies.
Once this project is done, I'm definitely taking some time off.
I wanna go somewhere and just relax on a trip or something.
I wrapped up my work while checking the last train schedule home.
I have to work late tomorrow too. I really hope this ends soon.
